Starlux is a new airline I've been really interested in trying. The last of the 3 large, well known Taiwanese airlines for me to try, but definitely not the least.

title: EK412 First Class Review

title: SQ231 Suites Review

**From/To:** SIN-SYD
**Distance Flown:** 3,911 mi

What better product to pick for my first flight on an A380 than Singapore Suites. Suites is know as one of, if not the best products in commerical aviation.

title: AF338 Business Class Review
excerpt:
**Date:** 07/29/2025
**Airline:** Air France
**Flight Number:** AF338
**Aircraft:** A350-900
**From/To:** CDG-SEA
**Distance Flown:** 5,003 mi

Transatlantic products are tricky - many of them are outdated or not 1-2-1. I knew Air France was better in this regard, and as I was having trouble finding efficient flights out of ARN back to the west coast, when I was able to find a ARN-CDG-SEA itinerary for a good price, I jumped on it.

title: AA98 Flagship Suites Review

**Aircraft:** 787-9
